# 数値解析（基礎の基礎）

## 実行結果

```sh
# ❯ ./01-exe 
2.000000
1.000000
3.000000
4.000000

#❯ ./02-exe 
x0 = 2.157890
x1 = 2.105259
x2 = 3.263155
x3 = 3.947366
x4 = 3.526314

#❯ ./03-exe 
λ=2.723532

#❯ ./04-exe  
x=1.414214

#❯ ./05-exe 
y = -51.100000 + 49.500000x
```

#❯ ./06-exe

n=400,s=0.695648,d=0.002500
n=500,s=0.695147,d=0.002000

#❯ ./07-exe
